attributes.additional_details: THE COST OF WILLS IS VARIABLE AND ALWAYS TOO HIGH FOR BASIC MIRROR WILLS. THIS LEADS TO HORRENDOUS PROBLEMS WHEN A WILL IS NOT IN PLACE FOR A PERSONS oR COUPLES ESTATE ON DEATH.  WITH ELECTRONIC TECHNOLOGY A MINIMUM OF EFFORT WOULD BE REQUIRED BY SOLICITORS TO CREATE A BASIC WILL FOR A SIMPLE COST OF, AT MOST, One Hundred and Fifty Pounds sterling. I Petition for this single cost for a WILL to be the standard in all SCOTLAND.

rejection.details: This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website. http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
